extendedInfo.description: Advance App Killer to Prolong Your Cellâs LifeToday, it is not uncommon to find people with a Smartphone. With advances in technology, every now and then, Smartphone with new version or feature hit the market. As Android is currently leading the market, a large majority of people carrying mobile phones with Android operating system. You must have downloaded various applications to perform and manage your tasks, and facing problem of battery draining. Actually, when you download numerous applications on your mobile phone, the cell starts consuming more battery and you have to recharge it more frequently. In such a situation you need an advances app manager to manage applications for you and increase the battery life. Lauruss InfoTech has recently design an app task manager to help you in scheduling the tasks in better way and improve the performance of your mobile phone.The Prime Features of Our Advanced App Killer:â¢	Kill selected tasksâ¢	Android optimizerâ¢	Ignore apps when kill tasksâ¢	Auto kill tasks on every screen offâ¢	Regular killâ¢	Startup Killâ¢	One click task kill widgetâ¢	Quick uninstallerâ¢	Show battery lifeâ¢	Support android 1.5/1.6/2.2/2.3/3.x/4.xHow Our Advanced App Manager Can Benefit YouOur advanced app manager lists all the running tasks in your phone and allows your kill apps that you do not require or consume the battery unnecessary. Once you check, select and kill the apps, the system will be rebooted and your mobile phone will start functioning smoothly. Lauruss InfoTech is a renowned mobile app development company, and this task manager is a new addition to its product range. You will get apps that not only speed up your businessâs activities, but also improve the performance of your Android Smartphone.Download Android task manager here and make your cell phone feel lighter and healthier.Keyword: taskiller taskkiller task killer taskmanager manager panel taskpanel process app, task killer pro, memory, ram, booster, optimize, boost, optimization, task killer, task manager, atk, taskiller, memory booster, ram booster, battery, save battery, battery booster, system manager, process kill, speed up, system speed, app killer, system panel, memory cleaner, tablet apps, App Killer, Task manager, App manager, Adavace app Killer, Adavace app manager
